name: Wild Downtown
description: The largest open world VR city. Experience total freedom and the pure joy of gaming while testing the limits of virtual reality. Wild Downtown is a VR game where you can dominate the whole city.
minimum_requirements: OS: Window 7 – 64bit Processor: Intel Core i5 – 4590 equivalent Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 / Radeon R9 290 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 9 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Window 10 – 64bit Processor: Intel Core i7 – 6800 equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 1070 / Radeon Pro Duo DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 9 GB available space
